sys_script_include.description: Renders a tree structure based on a given array. aNodes is an array of objects of the first level of the tree. nLevel specifies the current level - which can be used for rendering. bBottomUp specifies if the nodes should be rendered in reverse order. callbackRenderNode is an optional callback function used for node rendering. strNodes specifies the name of the object field that contains the array of sub nodes.
sys_script_include.name: HtmlRenderTree
